languages.text: "И истовую веру, живущую в нем. Знаю твою готовность служить мне и принимаю ее. Дух твой взвешен и одобрен".
"And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."
languages.original_text: "И истовую веру, живущую в нем. Знаю твою готовность служить мне и принимаю ее. Дух твой взвешен и одобрен".

traits.locale_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells in it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit was weighed and found worthy."
"And the fervent faith that dwells in it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit was weighed and found worthy."
"And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."
"And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."
"And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."
"And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."

languages.text: "Und der inbrünstige Glaube, der darin haust. Ich weiß um Eure Bereitschaft, mir zu dienen, und ich akzeptieren sie. Euer Geist wurde gewogen und für würdig befunden."
languages.original_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."

traits.locale_text: "Und der inbrünstige Glaube, der darin haust. Ich weiß um Eure Bereitschaft, mir zu dienen, und ich akzeptieren sie. Euer Geist wurde gewogen und für würdig befunden."

languages.text: «Y conozco el fervor que alberga. Sé que estás dispuest{mf|o|a} a servirme y lo acepto. Tu espíritu ha sido juzgado y ha resultado ser digno».
languages.original_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."

traits.locale_text: «Y conozco el fervor que alberga. Sé que estás dispuest{mf|o|a} a servirme y lo acepto. Tu espíritu ha sido juzgado y ha resultado ser digno».

languages.text: 「そして、その中に宿る熱烈な信仰を。私に仕えようとするその覚悟を知っているし、それを受け入れている。お前の魂は量られ、ふさわしいと認められた」
languages.original_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、その中に宿る熱烈な信仰を。私に仕えようとするその覚悟を知っているし、それを受け入れている。お前の魂は量られ、ふさわしいと認められた」

languages.text: “我也见过你心灵中炽热的信仰。我知道，你始终做好了侍奉我的准备，我接受你的虔诚。你的灵魂已经得到了称量，你受之无愧。”
languages.original_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."

traits.locale_text: “我也见过你心灵中炽热的信仰。我知道，你始终做好了侍奉我的准备，我接受你的虔诚。你的灵魂已经得到了称量，你受之无愧。”

languages.text: « Et la ferveur qui l'habite. Je sais que tu n'attends que de me servir, et je l'accepte. Ton esprit a été pesé et jugé digne. »
languages.original_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."

traits.locale_text: « Et la ferveur qui l'habite. Je sais que tu n'attends que de me servir, et je l'accepte. Ton esprit a été pesé et jugé digne. »

languages.text: "İçinde yaşayan coşkulu inancı da biliyorum. Bana hizmet etmek için ne denli hazır olduğunu biliyor ve hizmetini kabul ediyorum. Ruhun tartılıp muvafık bulundu."
languages.original_text: "And the fervent faith that dwells within it. I know your readiness to serve me, and I accept it. Your spirit has been weighed and found worthy."
